headline: MSCI’s Methodology Shakeup Could Be a Game Changer for Emerging Markets (MSCI)
summary: In the past week, MSCI drew significant attention ahead of its quarterly earnings report as news broke about upcoming methodology changes affecting emerging market indices, with a particular focus on Indonesia. Additionally, MSCI's continued expansion into private markets and innovations in private equity benchmarks have further highlighted the firm's growing industry influence. An interesting insight is that MSCI's proposed revisions to index inclusion criteria in Indonesia sparked the...
